title: Return on equity of BNP Paribas 2003 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Return on equity, containing a total of 16 data points.
Overall Return on equity has decreased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Return on equity, of value 21.2 was reached at Year 2006
The lowest Return on equity, of value 6.1 was reported at Year 2013
